revised_title: Exploration and Observations of Large Subterranean Caverns in Chalk Hills Near Norwich
tldr: This article describes the exploration and observations of large subterranean caverns in chalk hills near Norwich. The author, William Arderon, provides a detailed account of the cavern's structure, size, and the fossils found within. Henry Baker also discusses the temperature measurements taken in the caverns and compares them to the local climate.
